FSD — Feature Specifications (Behavior)

System Core Capabilities

Specification: Process Orchestration FSD-1
links outgoing: BRD-5, NFR-5
links incoming: FSD-1.1, FSD-1.2, FSD-1.3, FSD-1.4, FSD-1.5, FSD-8, FSD-9, SAD-1, SAD-2, TDD-1

The system must maintain independent but interconnected processes utilizing a multi-process architecture:
Specification: Core Hub FSD-1.1
links outgoing: FSD-1

Routes request-response messages between services and tracks in-flight requests via request_id.

Services (Spokes):
Specification: **UI Process:** Handles user interaction (PySide6). FSD-1.2
links outgoing: FSD-1
Specification: **Runtime Process:** GPU-optimized environment for model inference. FSD-1.3
links outgoing: FSD-1
Specification: **Audio Process:** Real-time audio I/O, WWD, and VAD. FSD-1.4
links outgoing: FSD-1
Specification: **LogServer (Sink):** Aggregates logs via PULL socket. FSD-1.5
links outgoing: FSD-1
Specification: Hierarchical State Machine (HSM) FSD-2
links outgoing: BRD-2
links incoming: FSD-2.1, FSD-2.2, FSD-2.3, TDD-1.6, TDD-4.3, ISP-1.4
Specification: Core must maintain an HSM (using `transitions` library). FSD-2.1
links outgoing: FSD-2
Specification: **Dynamic Compilation:** HSM must be dynamically compiled at startup from definitions provided by Tools, Routines, and Services. FSD-2.2
links outgoing: FSD-2
Specification: **Required States:** `Root(DEFAULT)`, `initializing`, `sleeping`, `waking`, `active`, `busy` (`llm`, `tts`, `stt`), `error`, `shutting_down`. FSD-2.3
links outgoing: FSD-2
Specification: Modular Extensions (Tools/Routines) FSD-3
links outgoing: BRD-5
links incoming: FSD-3.1, FSD-3.2, FSD-3.3, TDD-1.11, TDD-4
Specification: **Tools:** Modular functional assets with specific HSM states (e.g., File Export). FSD-3.1
links outgoing: FSD-3
Specification: **Routines:** Structured workflows composed of Tools and Services (e.g., Recipe Creator). FSD-3.2
links outgoing: FSD-3
Specification: **Default Routine:** A "Primary Routine" providing conversational LLM chat mapping GUI inputs to CLI commands. FSD-3.3
links outgoing: FSD-3

Voice Interaction Pipeline
Specification: Audio Acquisition (Audio Service) FSD-4
links outgoing: BRD-5, NFR-3
links incoming: FSD-4.1, FSD-4.2, FSD-4.3, FSD-4.5, ISP-5, ISP-5.1, ISP-5.2
Specification: **Wake Word:** Always-on detection using `pvporcupine`. FSD-4.1
links outgoing: FSD-4
Specification: **Constraint:** Must only send `WAKE_WORD_DETECTED` if Core is in `idle` state. FSD-4.2
links outgoing: FSD-4
Specification: **VAD (Stage 1):** Real-time, CPU-based VAD using `webrtcvad`. FSD-4.3
links outgoing: FSD-4
Specification: **VAD (Stage 2):** Neural VAD (Silero via ONNX Runtime CPU) runs locally in Audio Process. Refines |FSD-4.3| output. FSD-4.4
links outgoing: BRD-5.2, NFR-1.1, NFR-1
Specification: **Signal Output:** Emits normalized `SIGNAL_SPEECH` (Text) or `SIGNAL_WAKE` (Event) to Core. No command interpretation. FSD-4.5
links outgoing: FSD-4
Specification: Inference Execution (Runtime Service) FSD-5
links outgoing: BRD-5, NFR-1
links incoming: FSD-5.1, FSD-5.2, FSD-5.3, FSD-5.4
Specification: **STT:** Execute transcription using `faster-whisper` (ONNX) on audio buffers routed from Audio Service. FSD-5.1
links outgoing: FSD-5
Specification: **LLM:** Execute text generation using local models via ONNX Runtime. FSD-5.2
links outgoing: FSD-5
Specification: **TTS:** Execute synthesis using `kokoro` (ONNX). FSD-5.3
links outgoing: FSD-5
Specification: **Error Handling:** Must report clear error codes (e.g., `ONNX_E_CUDA_OOM`). FSD-5.4
links outgoing: FSD-5

Logging & Observability
Specification: Distributed Logging FSD-6
links outgoing: BRD-3, NFR-5
links incoming: FSD-6.1, FSD-6.2, FSD-6.3, FSD-6.4, SAD-3, ICD-3, TDD-1.10, TDD-3
Specification: All processes must emit logs to the central LogServer. FSD-6.1
links outgoing: FSD-6
Specification: **Fire-and-Forget:** Senders must never block; messages are dropped if LogServer is down. FSD-6.2
links outgoing: FSD-6
Specification: **Correlation:** All logs must include `request_id` for correlation across processes. FSD-6.3
links outgoing: FSD-6
Specification: **Traceability:** 100% traceable request coverage. FSD-6.4
links outgoing: FSD-6
Specification: Error Handling Strategy FSD-7
links outgoing: BRD-2, NFR-5
links incoming: FSD-7.1, FSD-7.2, FSD-7.3, FSD-7.4, TDD-1.9
Specification: **LogServer Fault:** Senders continue normally, silently dropping logs. FSD-7.1
links outgoing: FSD-7
Specification: **Service Fault:** Core detects disconnection, marks service unavailable, transitions requests to error. FSD-7.2
links outgoing: FSD-7
Specification: **Timeout:** Core detects non-response (>5.0s) and triggers error state. FSD-7.3
links outgoing: FSD-7
Specification: **Core Fault:** Services remain operational but disconnected; attempt reconnect on restart. FSD-7.4
links outgoing: FSD-7
Specification: Intent Resolution (The "Brain") FSD-8
links outgoing: BRD-5.6, FSD-1
links incoming: FSD-8.1, FSD-8.2, FSD-8.3, FSD-8.4, TDD-1.14
Specification: **Input Normalization:** Core accepts inputs (`VOICE`, `CLI`, `GUI`) as uniform text strings. FSD-8.1
links outgoing: FSD-8
Specification: **Command Registry:** Core maintains a registry of valid commands mapping "String" → "Callable". FSD-8.2
links outgoing: FSD-8
Specification: **Fast Path:** IF input matches Registry Key → Execute immediately (Deterministic). FSD-8.3
links outgoing: FSD-8
Specification: **Slow Path:** IF input does not match → Forward to LLM Service for inference (Probabilistic). FSD-8.4
links outgoing: FSD-8
Specification: User Experience (UX) FSD-9
links outgoing: BRD-5.5, FSD-1.2
links incoming: FSD-9.1, FSD-9.2, FSD-9.3, TDD-2.8, TDD-2.9
Specification: **State Reflection:** UI must visually reflect state (Dark/Gray for Sleep, Bright/Color for Active). FSD-9.1
links outgoing: FSD-9
Specification: **Input Locking:** Text input disabled in Sleep; Blinking cursor only in Active. FSD-9.2
links outgoing: FSD-9
Specification: **Wake Triggers:** System wakes on Voice ("Hey Maggie") OR Click-to-Wake on input box. FSD-9.3
links outgoing: FSD-9
